Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch

International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Precise quartz movement never looked this good. This Hunter collection case pocket watch shows a heraldic shield emblem on the back, finely accented with a brass-tone finish. The white dial has black Roman numeral indicators and date display at the 3 o'clock hour. Matching curb chain. White dial. Date display. Swiss parts quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold- plated. 1.85 in. Dia. Combining the rich look of gold plating with a creamy off-white dial and black-tone Roman numeral hour markers, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Quartz Pocket Watch 3675 is a sophisticated yet understated mix of classic design and modern touches. The cover features a detailed scroll design for an old-world quality, while quartz movement ensures optimum precision and accuracy. A 0.5 micron 14k gold-plated case with polished shield looks luxurious and elegant, and comes with matching curb chain. Designed to last for years to come, this Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue gift-box with warranty card and belt clip.
